Name: Three Blind Mice
Ingredients: 30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of chunk of artichoke .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Review: Stirred down and boozy, corn notes from the whiskey are amplified by the bittersweet aperitif liqueur and aromatised wine.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2016 at Scarfes Bar, Rosewood Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Three Blind Mice contains 210 calories
